member.name: M:WinCopies.GUI.IO.Process.ProcessBase`5.CheckIfPauseOrCancellationPending
member.summary: Checks if a cancellation or a pause is pending. See Remarks section.
member.returns: A value indicating whether a cancellation or a pause is pending.

remarks.para: This method checks if a cancellation is pending, then, if not, checks if a pause is pending. These checks are performed by calling the and methods.

Each of these methods is called only if the corresponding -Pending property is . If one of these methods is called, the property is assigned to the value returned by the one of these method that was called.
If one of these method is called, the other one is not.
